meanings.definition: A board or molding at the base of a wall, often used to protect the wall from damage.
meanings.sent1: The mopboards in the hallway were painted white to match the walls.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally bumped into the mopboards and chipped the paint.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the mopboards were a great scratching post.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to keep the house spotless was as solid as the mopboards themselves.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming in through the window highlighted the clean lines of the mopboards.

meanings.definition: To clean or wipe down mopboards with a damp cloth.
meanings.sent1: Every weekend, she diligently mopboards the entire house.
meanings.sent2: Remember to mopboards gently to avoid damaging the paint.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he could mopboards blindfolded with his eyes closed.
meanings.sent4: The way she meticulously mopboards showed her attention to detail.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the damp cloth swishing against the mopboards filled the room.
